Similarly, in Debian Jessie:

ImportError: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.21' not found
(required by /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so)

body:
Similarly, in Debian Jessie:
```
ImportError: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.21' not found
(required by /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so)
```
